browserSupport: Primarily supported in Chromium-based browsers (Chrome, Edge, Opera, etc.). Firefox, Safari, and others may work with limitations.
propertyWarning: The 5th number must match object type (16) and the 6th number must match object subtype
clickHexToSelect: Click on a hex to select
customDefWarning: All states must have a customDef value when any state has one
jsonFileStructureError: Required structure "RMG.objectGeneration.16" not found in JSON file
noSubtypesError: No subtypes found in the JSON file
confirmFileOpen: Opening a file will reset all current values. Continue?
resetConfirmation: All current values will be reset to their defaults. Continue?

spellFlags.64: 64 - Has mass effect at expert level
spellFlags.4096: 4096 - Cannot be cast on war machines

helpTexts.objectType: The numeric type key for the object. This parameter does not change.
helpTexts.objectSubtype: The numeric subtype key for the object.
helpTexts.properties: Special properties of the object, including visual appearance, mask definitions, and other settings.
helpTexts.enabled: Determines if the object is enabled for random map generation.
helpTexts.value: The numeric value of the object. Determines the overall value for random map generation.
helpTexts.density: Determines the density of objects on the map. Higher values make the object more likely to appear in RMG.
helpTexts.name: The display name of the object that appears when players interact with it.
helpTexts.sound: Sound files associated with the object interactions.
helpTexts.soundEnter: The .wav file played when a player enters the object.
helpTexts.soundLoop: The .wav file played in a loop while the player is near the object.
helpTexts.text: Text displayed when interacting with an object.
helpTexts.textVisit: Text displayed when a player visits the object. This can include lore or instructions.
helpTexts.troopPlacement: Configuration for troop placement on the battlefield.
helpTexts.isBank: Determines if this is a creature bank (true) or a dwelling (false).
helpTexts.attackers: Array of positions for attacking troops. Customize using the grid selector.
helpTexts.defenders: Array of positions for defending troops. Customize using the grid selector.
helpTexts.states: Different states of the object (0-3) that are randomly selected at map start. Each state can define different rewards and guardians.
helpTexts.stateChance: Probability of this state being chosen (percentage, 0-100). The sum of chances for all states should equal 100.
helpTexts.customDef: Custom DEF file name to override the default appearance of the object. If specified in one state, it must be specified in all states.
helpTexts.artifactIds: Specific artifact IDs to be awarded. Array of up to 4 values ranging from -1 to 1023. -1 means no artifact.
helpTexts.artifactTypeCounts: Number of random artifacts by rarity type. Array of 4 numbers for: treasure, minor, major, and relic artifacts.
helpTexts.resources: Resources that are given as a reward, in order: wood, ore, mercury, sulfur, crystal, gems, gold, mithril.
helpTexts.creatureReward: Configuration for the creature reward, combining type and count in one setting.
helpTexts.creatureRewardType: Creature type ID for the reward (-1 means no creature reward).
helpTexts.creatureRewardCount: Number of creatures awarded as reward.
helpTexts.guardians: Configuration for guardian creatures defending the object (-1 means the slot is disabled).
helpTexts.guardiansCount: The number of each type of guardian. Values range from 0 to 2,147,483,647 for each slot.
helpTexts.guardiansType: Identifiers of guardian creature types. Values range from -1 to 999, where -1 means no creature in this slot.
helpTexts.upgrade: Chance for upgraded versions of guardians (percentage, 0-100).
helpTexts.skills: Hero skills that are given as a reward.
helpTexts.skillsPrimary: Primary skills values for Attack, Defense, Power, and Knowledge. Values range from 0 to 127 for each skill.
helpTexts.experience: Amount of experience points given as a reward.
helpTexts.spellPoints: Amount of spell points given as a reward.
helpTexts.morale: Morale modifier for the state (values from -3 to 3; positive values boost morale).
helpTexts.luck: Luck modifier for the state (values from -3 to 3; positive values boost luck).
helpTexts.spells: Spells that can be acquired from the object. Up to 4 spells can be defined per state.
helpTexts.spellsId: ID number of the spell, corresponds to spell identifiers in Heroes 3.
helpTexts.spellsBits: Configuration parameters for random spell generation, including schools, levels, and flags. Specifying a flag/level/school limits spell generation to the selected parameters.
helpTexts.bitsFlags: Special flag bits affecting spell behavior (value range: 1-4294967295).
helpTexts.bitsLevels: Spell level configuration (value range: 1-31). For example, to allow levels 2 and 3 use 12 (2^2 + 2^3).
helpTexts.bitsSchools: Magic schools associated with the spell (1-Fire, 2-Water, 4-Air, 8-Earth). Combine values to select multiple schools.
